title: Global Day of Coderetreat - Portland, OR, USA
description:
On Saturday, October 22nd, the Global Day of Coderetreat will bring programmers together from all over the globe.   Portland continues its strong record of building better developers and growing the Portland software community with its 5th GDCR offering. 

 Come join your fellow programmers to practice the art of software development together.  Write code, learn from others, teach someone else, and expand your network of friends who are passionate about their craft. Show up with your laptop and favorite development tools to participate, everything else is provided.  Continental breakfast and lunch will be served.
